## simctl connect

connect to another AMF

```
simctl connect <ranName> <ip> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
connect 127.0.0.2
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for connect
```

      --db string   Database URL for simulator (default "mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017")
